description: 5.56x45mm ammunition with subsonic 131gr tungsten bullets, a PDW version of the heavier 5.56 OCG Noctis. Trades range and power for low recoil, noise and good armor penetration.

5.56x45mm ammunition with subsonic 154gr depleted uranium bullets. While weaker and shorter ranged than dedicated subsonic rounds such as 9x39mm, they are more compact and can cut armor like a hot knife through butter.

5.56x45mm ammunition with subsonic 92gr JHP lead bullets. Carefully designed to achieve the best possible ballistics against soft targets, it has low recoil but lacks the armor penetration of a factory-made subsonic round.
//: Not sure if this would ever be useful, added it regardless.

description: 5.56x45mm ammunition with subsonic 92gr JHP lead bullets. Carefully designed to achieve the best possible ballistics against soft targets, it has low recoil but lacks the armor penetration of a factory-made subsonic round.
//: 320 m/s muzzle velocity. 18 base dmg with a 25% JHP bonus. Russians invented 9x39mm to replace subsonic 5.45mm rounds for a good reason.
